Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2009 06:18PM jenm24 wrote: Hi JudyNaomi, thanks so much for your support.  The women on this site are so amazing and supportive and connected to one another. v cool.  My mom is 1/2 way through her chemo treatment.  My Dad took her to the Grand Canyon this week- sweet huh?  She is sick, but kicking ass.  A true cancer babe- right? :)  Thanks again~
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2009 12:36PM jenm24 wrote: Hi ladies, my mom is going through chemo and has lost all of her hair.  I just chopped mine and want to make a wig for her.  Does anyone know an organization that does this?  If I can't make one specifically for her, I'd like to donate my hair to a woman with breast cancer.  I've looked into locks of love- but that's for kids.  Any suggestions?  Thanks!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2009 06:07PM jenm24 wrote: Hi Rachel_BC,  Thanks for the info.  I will keep you posted and pass what I learn onto others.  And yes!  I would love to know the org that made your wig for you.  Maybe they can use my hair instead of my mom's?  (She is totally bald right now- poor thing).  Thanks again,
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2009 06:00PM jenm24 wrote: Hi sanaisa, Thanks for your note.  I'm looking into Pantene Beautiful Lengths: http://www.beautifullengths.com/en_US/wigshelpingwomen.jsp They claim to give away the wigs for free.  I called about having a wig made specifically for my mom.  They said they could do it if there is a wig maker in your area.  Aparently, there is not one here in San Francisco.  I'll do some more research and see if I can find another route.  Keep u posted.  I also love your idea about the extensions... I'll ask my mom and see what she thinks. PS. I had really long hair too.  It feels great having it short and even better knowing that it will help improve the quality of someone's life.  You'll have to post a pic of you new locks!   Have fun tomorrow!
